alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 8:19AM CST until February 24 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Richland Creek Above Pulaski affecting Giles County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Richland Creek Above Pulaski. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Portions of Vales Mill Rd between Chicken Creek Rd and the Highway 64 bypass become inundated and may be subject to closure * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 19.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to climb near 21.0 feet by this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.2 feet on 06/05/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM CST.
